TCName.name: nonreplenArticle_Disp
TCName.nonrepleArticles: SELECT DISTINCT A.MATNR FROM SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING B, SAAP.ZWOWC_ART_LIST_DEPARTMENT C, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM D, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_EAN E WHERE A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND B.MATNR = C.MATNR AND C.MATNR = D.MATNR AND D.MATNR = E.MATNR AND B.AUTOSTOCKR_IND <> 'Y'

TCName.name: createPromoForFreshAndNonFreshFood_Disp
TCName.FreshFoodart: select distinct master.matnr,master.online_desc,ean.EAN11 from saap.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING list,saap.zwowc_article_master master,saap.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_HIER_XREF hier,saap.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_EAN ean where list.matnr=master.MATNR and master.matnr=hier.matnr and master.matnr=ean.matnr and master.PBD_IND='N' and master.FRESH_FOOD_FLAG='Y' and list.AUTOSTOCKR_IND='Y' and master.matnr in (select matnr from saap.MAT_VIEW_ZWOW_ARTICLES_HIER where dept in freshfood)

TCName.name: createinstoreDisplayPBD_Disp
TCName.pbdarticles: select distinct master.matnr,master.online_desc,ean.EAN11 from saap.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING list,saap.zwowc_article_master master,saap.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_HIER_XREF hier,saap.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_EAN ean where list.matnr=master.MATNR and master.matnr=hier.matnr and master.matnr=ean.matnr and master.PBD_IND='Y' and master.FRESH_FOOD_FLAG!='Y' and list.AUTOSTOCKR_IND='Y' and master.matnr in (select matnr from saap.MAT_VIEW_ZWOW_ARTICLES_HIER where dept in nonfreshfood)

TCName.name: verifyExceedLimits_Disp
TCName.artcicleOM_ValueasOne: select distinct master.matnr,master.online_desc,ean.EAN11 from saap.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING list,saap.zwowc_article_master master,saap.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_HIER_XREF hier,saap.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_EAN ean where list.matnr=master.MATNR and master.matnr=hier.matnr and master.matnr=ean.matnr and master.PBD_IND='N' and master.FRESH_FOOD_FLAG!='Y' and list.AUTOSTOCKR_IND='Y' and master.matnr in (select matnr from saap.MAT_VIEW_ZWOW_ARTICLES_HIER where dept in nonfreshfood)

TCName.name: BlockedProcurement_Disp
TCName.article: SELECT MATNR,ALC_STATUS,PS_ARTICLE_STATUS FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING WHERE MATNR IN (SELECT MATNR FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER WHERE PBD_IND = 'N') AND (PS_ARTICLE_STATUS = '02') AND ALC_STATUS NOT IN ('EC','ES') AND AUTOSTOCKR_IND = 'Y' ORDER BY ALC_STATUS DESC

TCName.name: ESArticles_Disp
TCName.article: SELECT * FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER WHERE MATNR IN (SELECT MATNR FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING WHERE ALC_STATUS = 'ES') AND PBD_IND = 'N'

TCName.name: ProductRecallArticles_Disp
TCName.article: SELECT MATNR,ALC_STATUS,PS_ARTICLE_STATUS FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING WHERE MATNR IN (SELECT MATNR FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER WHERE PBD_IND = 'N') AND (PS_ARTICLE_STATUS = '08') AND ALC_STATUS NOT IN ('RA','DA','NA') ORDER BY ALC_STATUS DESC

TCName.name: ECArticles_Disp
TCName.article: SELECT * FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER WHERE MATNR IN (SELECT MATNR FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING WHERE ALC_STATUS = 'EC') AND PBD_IND = 'N'

TCName.name: ReadyForArchiving_Disp
TCName.article: SELECT MATNR,ALC_STATUS,PS_ARTICLE_STATUS FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING WHERE MATNR IN (SELECT MATNR FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER WHERE PBD_IND = 'N' ) AND PS_ARTICLE_STATUS = 'ZA' AND ALC_STATUS NOT IN ('RA','DA','NA')
